topstar.mytoken.v1.MsgBurn.description: MsgBurn defines a message for burning tokens.

topstar.mytoken.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the module.

burn_rate.title: burn_rate is the percentage of tokens to burn on transfer (e.g., 1 = 1%)

treasury_address.title: treasury_address is the address where treasury tokens are sent

treasury_rate.title: treasury_rate is the percentage of tokens to send to treasury on transfer (e.g., 1 = 1%)
